'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.2''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on September 9, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/260|title=Release 1.1.2 (1.21.120.21)|website=GitHub|date=September 9, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/39436905010189-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-120-21|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.120.21|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=September 9, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added a {{cd|showAlpha}} flag to color timeline so we can hide picker alpha elements conditionally.
* Added {{cd|IVector2PropertyItem}} API for property pane.
* Added {{cd|IMenuPropertyItem}} which represents a hamburger menu button that can support nested submenus.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that caused scrollbar to pop in/out in the AGFX Graph Color component
